availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Riley Harrison Browning (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Cushman Browning in Pendleton County on December 24, 1844. Father of Sarah C. Browning, James A. Browning, Mary A. Browning, Elijah M. Browning, Lucy Browning, and Oliver C. Browning. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 247.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, film #000272800, p. 359-360.
Find A Grave, "Riley Harrison Browning (March 7, 1825-February 5, 1889)," Memorial #120787798, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/120787798 (accessed June 11, 2018).
